title: Tea Tree Therapy Antiseptic Cream, 4 Ounce (Pack of 3)
features: TARGETED SKIN SUPPORT: Formulated to provide targeted support for various skin concerns
TEA TREE OIL INFUSION: Harnessing the natural power of tea tree oil, offers a potent and refreshing solution for your skin
SOOTHING AND NOURISHING: Unique blend of ingredients helps calm and soothe the skin, leaving it feeling refreshed and nourished
VERSATILE APPLICATION: Suitable for both face and body, can be used to address a wide range of skin issues
CONVENIENT SIZE: Packaged in a travel-friendly container, perfect for on-the-go use and can easily fit into your daily skincare routine
description: With Tea Tree Oil and Herbal Extracts Relieves Minor Skin Irritations Tea Tree Therapy Antiseptic Cream with its soothing and cooling action relieves minor skin irritations such as rashes, minor cuts, sunburn, scratches and insect bites.
